name: Chonkers
storyline:
Need more cats in your life, but you’re afraid the tons of litter sand won’t fit in your monthly budget?
Fear not! Chonkers is a cozy idle game for cat lovers.

Open the door and welcome the most adorable stray kittens into your rooms!
Take a break. Relax and watch them sleep while listening to lo-fi music.
Play with them and make them level up faster!

Let them chonkify without worrying about health risks!
(This is digital fun. Always seek professional help for your puffy little friends )

If you’re lucky, you might also adopt the rarest galaxy wanderers. Those stray kittens from space with a mesmerizing glittery mane are in need of a new home. Give them a proper welcome ♥

When you think they’re ready for a new family, give them away for their weight in gold!

Complete your collection book with more than 100 breeds and 400+ variants.

If relaxation and cats are your thing, this is a game for you~
summary: Chonkers is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Adopt the cutest fur balls and watch them ramp up the chonk scale as you play with them. Find them a new family. They’ll pay A LOT for your hefty chonker! Complete your collection by finding all the breeds and the rarest space cats!
